name: TrueCare24, Inc.
description: Developer of an on-demand mobile platform designed for finding and managing reliable and affordable caregivers directly, as well as other services for seniors. The company's platform offers access to on-demand doctors with phone or video, in-home in person, or at-work consultation availability in a short span of time, enabling users to book and avail of home-based care at their convenience.
